mapper.select: SELECT brand_id as brandId, YEAR(month_start_date) as "year", COALESCE(SUM(total_order_count), 0) as totalOrderCount, COALESCE(SUM(total_sales_amount), 0) as totalSalesAmount, COALESCE(SUM(total_commission_amount), 0) as totalCommissionAmount, COALESCE(SUM(total_tax_amount), 0) as totalTaxAmount, COALESCE(SUM(total_pg_fee_amount), 0) as totalPgFeeAmount FROM settlements_monthly WHERE brand_id = #{brandId} AND month_start_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY brand_id, YEAR(month_start_date) ORDER BY YEAR(month_start_date)
